---
title: "Shiny Document"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r Example, echo = FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(knitr)

rmdfiles <- c("RMarkdownFile.Rmd")
sapply(rmdfiles, knit, quiet = T)

ui <- shinyUI(
    fluidPage(
        withMathJax(includeMarkdown("RMarkdownFile.md"))
  )
)
server <- function(input, output) { }

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
